data.name: Jelly Express
data.detailed_description:
Jelly Express is a two player co-op physics game. You will be playing two little jellies who will deliver boxes over obstacles to reach their destination. The only tool you will need to use is a wooden board overhead, so use your ability to stretch, jump, and move to keep the boxes steady on the board. Be careful not to break the boxes!

Online Co-op is not currently supported by the game demo :(

Story:


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The Halapia Festival has begun! This is the day when the soon-to-be adult Jelly departs from the Great Fridge and travels through the continent. The six jelly races have long prepared your coming-of-age challenges! By delivering the goods, you will be gifted by the six jelly races, the more intact the goods, the more exquisite the reward!

In this journey, you will travel from huge gardens to delicate machinery; from the bouncy jelly to warm beaches; from the quiet seabed with elusive buoyancy to the deep cave that reveals the mysteries of light; from the rainforests to the vase skies that every adventurer dreams of. Each world has its own unique challenges, and you may even discover hidden places with special levels and symbols left by the ancestors.



Don't let the simple movements fool you. Stretching, jumping, and even running might be easy, but the players must work together perfectly to deliver the goods. Go on an adventure with a friend and see what's out there!
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Game Features:

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Jelly Jelly Jelly! : Is there anyone who doesn't enjoy gluey, cute jellies? Here we have jelly everywhere. To better preserve the jelly, we have prepared many refrigerators in order to help it live a long, healthy life!



Lots of Co-ops: Cooperation is the key to getting the job done. Make use of your elastic ability and collaborate with your friend. Remember it takes two flints to make a fire!

Lots of Maps: Well, not a lot, just six maps, but we can assure you that each is unique in its own way and will provide a refreshing experience. Have fun!

Lots of Gifts: Complete all the challenges from the six races and solve the puzzle left by the ancestors to receive your rewards!

Hats: Jelly loves hats! Every jelly deserves a hat!



Hint: Don’t drop your hat!

data.short_description: Jelly Express is a two player co-op physics game. You will be playing two little jellies who will deliver boxes over obstacles to reach their destination. The only tool you have is a wooden board overhead, so use your ability to stretch, jump, and move to keep the boxes steady on the board.
data.supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris/AMD Vega 8 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete GPU / Nvidia 1050 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
